HierarchicalPropertiesEvaluator.evaluate(applicationContext.getEnvironment(), "camel.dataformat.customizer", "camel.dataformat.xstream.customizer", ((HasId) customizer).getId()) : HierarchicalPropertiesEvaluator.evaluate(applicationContext.getEnvironment(), "camel.dataformat.customizer", "camel.dataformat.xstream.customizer").             if (useCustomizer) {                 LOGGER.debug("Configure dataformat {}, with customizer {}", dataformat, customizer).                 customizer.customize(dataformat).             }         }     }     return dataformat. }
